Name: The Witcher
Star: Henry Cavill, Freya Allan, Anya Chalotra, Mimi Ndiweni
Summary: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Name: Hawkeye
Star: Jeremy Renner, Hailee Steinfeld, Florence Pugh, Vera Farmiga
Summary: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.

Name: Dexter: New Blood
Star: Michael C. Hall, Jack Alcott, Julia Jones, Johnny Sequoyah
Summary: Set 10 years after Dexter Morgan went missing in the eye of Hurricane Laura, he is now living under an assumed name in Upstate New York, Iron Lake, far from his original home in Miami.

Name: Station Eleven
Star: Joe Pingue, Mackenzie Davis, Himesh Patel, Matilda Lawler
Summary: A post apocalyptic saga spanning multiple timelines, telling the stories of survivors of a devastating flu as they attempt to rebuild and reimagine the world anew while holding on to the best of what's been lost.

Name: Death on the Nile
Star: Kenneth Branagh, Gal Gadot, Tom Bateman, Rose Leslie
Summary: While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.

Name: Money Heist
Star: Úrsula Corberó, Álvaro Morte, Itziar Ituño, Pedro Alonso
Summary: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

Name: Yellowjackets
Star: Melanie Lynskey, Tawny Cypress, Ella Purnell, Sophie Nélisse
Summary: A wildly talented high school girl soccer team becomes the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Ontario wilderness.

Name: The Expanse
Star: Steven Strait, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham, Shohreh Aghdashloo
Summary: In the 24th century, a group of humans untangle a vast plot which threatens the Solar System's fragile state of detente.

Name: Dexter
Star: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, David Zayas, James Remar
Summary: He's smart. He's lovable. He's Dexter Morgan, America's favorite serial killer, who spends his days solving crimes and nights committing them. Golden Globe winner Michael C. Hall stars in the hit SHOWTIME Original Series.

Name: Lost in Space
Star: Molly Parker, Toby Stephens, Maxwell Jenkins, Taylor Russell
Summary: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fight against all odds to survive and escape, but they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

Name: The Batman
Star: Robert Pattinson, Peter Sarsgaard, Andy Serkis, Zoë Kravitz
Summary: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

Name: Squid Game
Star: Lee Jung-jae, Park Hae-soo, Wi Ha-Joon, Jung Hoyeon
Summary: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes. A survival game that has a whopping 45.6 billion-won prize at stake.

Name: Doctor Who
Star: Jodie Whittaker, Peter Capaldi, Pearl Mackie, Matt Smith
Summary: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

Name: Supernatural
Star: Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles, Jim Beaver, Misha Collins
Summary: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons and gods that roam the earth.

Name: NCIS
Star: Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Sean Murray, Pauley Perrette
Summary: The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.

Name: Scream
Star: Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, David Arquette, Marley Shelton
Summary: Twenty-five years after the original series of murders in Woodsboro, a new killer emerges, and Sidney Prescott must return to uncover the truth.

Name: The Blacklist
Star: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Summary: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Name: Antlers
Star: Keri Russell, Jesse Plemons, Jeremy T. Thomas, Graham Greene
Summary: In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher and her sheriff brother become embroiled with her enigmatic student, whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with an ancestral creature.

Name: Last Night in Soho
Star: Thomasin McKenzie, Anya Taylor-Joy, Matt Smith, Diana Rigg
Summary: An aspiring fashion designer is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s where she encounters a dazzling wannabe singer. But the glamour is not all it appears to be and the dreams of the past start to crack and splinter into something darker.

Name: Stranger Things
Star: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder, David Harbour
Summary: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Name: Criminal Minds
Star: Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna
Summary: The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.

Name: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
Star: Mariska Hargitay, Christopher Meloni, Ice-T, Dann Florek
Summary: This series follows the Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of detectives in the N.Y.P.D., who investigate sexually related crimes.

Name: The Silent Sea
Star: Bae Doona, Gong Yoo, Joon Lee, Feodor Chin
Summary: During a perilous 24-hour mission on the moon, space explorers try to retrieve samples from an abandoned research facility steeped in classified secrets.

Name: Castle
Star: Nathan Fillion, Stana Katic, Susan Sullivan, Jon Huertas
Summary: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Name: Aranyak
Star: Parambrata Chattopadhyay, Ashutosh Rana, Raveena Tandon, Taneesha Joshi
Summary: Political ploys, personal agendas and a beastly myth all surface as two mismatched hill station cops navigate a web of suspects after a puzzling murder.

Name: The Witcher: Blood Origin
Star: Michelle Yeoh, Laurence O'Fuarain, Jacob Collins-Levy, Lenny Henry
Summary: Prequel to the Netflix series 'The Witcher', set in an elven world 1,200 years before the show, centering on the origins of the very first Witcher.

Name: Midnight Mass
Star: Kate Siegel, Zach Gilford, Kristin Lehman, Samantha Sloyan
Summary: An isolated island community experiences miraculous events - and frightening omens - after the arrival of a charismatic, mysterious young priest.

Name: Only Murders in the Building
Star: Steve Martin, Martin Short, Selena Gomez, Aaron Dominguez
Summary: Three strangers who share an obsession with true crime suddenly find themselves caught up in one.

Name: Westworld
Star: Evan Rachel Wood, Jeffrey Wright, Ed Harris, Thandiwe Newton
Summary: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.

Name: Riverdale
Star: Lili Reinhart, Camila Mendes, Cole Sprouse, K.J. Apa
Summary: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

Name: Midsomer Murders
Star: John Nettles, Jane Wymark, Barry Jackson, Neil Dudgeon
Summary: A veteran Detective Chief Inspector and his young Sergeant investigate murders around the regional community of Midsomer County.

Name: The Vampire Diaries
Star: Nina Dobrev, Paul Wesley, Ian Somerhalder, Kat Graham
Summary: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Name: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
Star: Theo James, Mary McDonnell, Lara Pulver, Graham McTavish
Summary: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.

Name: Mare of Easttown
Star: Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice
Summary: A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.

Name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Star: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Eric Sykes
Summary: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

Name: Big Sky
Star: Katheryn Winnick, Kylie Bunbury, Brian Geraghty, Dedee Pfeiffer
Summary: A private detective teams up with an ex-cop to solve a kidnapping case in Montana.

Name: Bones
Star: Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne
Summary: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Name: House M.D.
Star: Hugh Laurie, Omar Epps, Robert Sean Leonard, Jesse Spencer
Summary: An antisocial maverick doctor who specializes in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases that come his way using his crack team of doctors and his wits.

Name: The Lighthouse
Star: Robert Pattinson, Willem Dafoe, Valeriia Karaman, Logan Hawkes
Summary: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

Name: Lost
Star: Jorge Garcia, Josh Holloway, Yunjin Kim, Evangeline Lilly
Summary: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Name: The Sinner
Star: Bill Pullman, Jessica Hecht, Dohn Norwood, Adam LeFevre
Summary: Anthology series that examines how and why ordinary people commit brutal crimes.

Name: Legacies
Star: Danielle Rose Russell, Aria Shahghasemi, Quincy Fouse, Matthew Davis
Summary: Hope Mikaelson, a tribrid daughter of a Vampire/Werewolf hybrid, makes her way in the world.

Name: True Detective
Star: Vince Vaughn, Colin Farrell, Rachel McAdams, Taylor Kitsch
Summary: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

Name: Wind River
Star: Elizabeth Olsen, Jeremy Renner, Graham Greene, Kelsey Asbille
Summary: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

Name: Old
Star: Gael García Bernal, Vicky Krieps, Rufus Sewell, Alex Wolff
Summary: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

Name: Killers of the Flower Moon
Star: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jesse Plemons, Robert De Niro, Brendan Fraser
Summary: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Name: Sherlock
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs, Rupert Graves
Summary: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

Name: Vigil
Star: Suranne Jones, Rose Leslie, Shaun Evans, Paterson Joseph
Summary: The mysterious disappearance of a Scottish fishing trawler and a death onboard a Trident nuclear submarine bring the police into conflict with the Navy and British security services.

Name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
Star: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Michael Gambon
Summary: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

Name: Pig
Star: Nicolas Cage, Alex Wolff, Adam Arkin, Cassandra Violet
Summary: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregonian wilderness must return to his past in Portland in search of his beloved foraging pig after she is kidnapped.
